name: Discourse
longDescription: Discourse is an open source Internet forum system. Features include threading, categorization and tagging of discussions, configurable access control, live updates, expanding link previews, infinite scrolling, and real-time notifications. It is customizable via its plugin architecture and its theming system.
description: Discourse is modern forum software for your community. Use it as a mailing list, discussion forum, long-form chat room, and more!.
